page.title: 10LAMBEG/CASTLEROBN.RECREATION
page.content: The provision of{recreational {amenities}in this area has improved slowly in recent years. Apart from a{BMX track,}no new amenity has been provided since the 1960's. The amenities which do exist,are mostly concentrated in the south-east where the greatest density of housing is to be found.The Milltown housing estate has a children's playground in a poor state of repair and some open ground.The Lambeg playground is in only slightly better condition. On Harmony Heights,there is a council playing field but this area is without any other much needed children's playground or proper youth club facility. {SEE **NOTE* For other{recreational activities,} the area is well served by facilities in{Belfast}and{Lisburn. }
